title: [Medicine] Empagliflozin decreased composite cardiovascular death and kidney disease progression at eGFR cutoff of 20 ml/min in a study of 5000 patients. This would be the SGLT2i with the lowest eGFR cutoff for use.
[Health] Magnesium Supplementation Stimulates Autophagy to Reduce Lipid Accumulation in Hepatocytes via the AMPK/mTOR Pathway (Oct 2022)
